name: Space Racing 3D: Void
description:
Experience the thrill of space races with Space Racing 3D: Void. The game has several modes, including a split-screen for 2 players.

You'll find racing tracks that contain crazy loops and places from where you can perform various jumps. Once in the air, you can perform backflips and spins.

Controls:
Arrow keys - Drive
Space - Break / Drift
Shift - Nitro
Z, X, C - Perform tricks
